title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: This task involves gathering and documenting the detailed requirements for the OpportunityAlertSystem, including user roles, features, integration points with existing systems (HR, Learning Management, Project Management tools), data privacy and security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, deployment environments, and a comprehensive analysis of potential technical debt and long-term maintainability. The document should also include a high-level architecture diagram outlining the proposed system's structure.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including components, data flow, technology stack, scalability considerations, security measures, and integration points with existing systems. This design should be modular, extensible, and flexible to accommodate future changes and growth.

title: Design User Interface for Opportunity Alert System
description: Design the user interface for the OpportunityAlertSystem, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes. The UI should be intuitive, responsive, accessible, and visually appealing, following best practices for user experience design and aligning with our company's brand guidelines. Collaborate with UX/UI designers and developers to ensure the design is feasible for implementation.

title: Design Database Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing and retrieving opportunity data, user profiles, preferences, and notifications. Consider data models for opportunities, users, roles, skills, interests, and notification history. Ensure data integrity, normalization, and efficient querying. Additionally, consider implementing search functionalities for improved usability.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for managing opportunities, user profiles, and notifications.

title: Implement Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application for users to view and manage opportunities and preferences.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement authentication and authorization mechanisms for secure access to the system.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated build, testing, and deployment of the system.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the system.
